__e: Well, I've forgotten how to do it. Or maybe I don't want to anymore.
I fail to see what this has to do with the money you owe me, Thomas.
Failed to keep my home, failed to stay with your mom, failed to be a real dad to you.
You said you failed as a father, but the truth is I failed as a son.
And thank God for that, because I will have completely failed you as a father if you end up anything like me.
If that's what you really think of me, then I have failed as a mother.
It's odd, but... I think I've failed you... taking you for granted all these years, but...
But a father should give his daughter love as well as respect, and in that I failed you.
And long ago, I guess, I even failed with you .. .. or you wouldn't have done what you did.
But a father should give his daughter love as well as respect, and in that I failed you.
If this is only about winning for you guys... then I owe you all an apology... because I've failed you... and we should just all go home because it means we've already lost.
And long ago, I guess, I even failed with you .. .. or you wouldn't have done what you did.
The thing I can't seem to shake is... ..feeling that I've failed in my duty of care.
I think we can all agree I'm not at my best right now, probably because I failed my drug test.
I almost got my best friend's mother arrested. I'm in Brooklyn talking about it to...
You think I haven't failed in life?
I'm supposed to be the guy that can protect them from something as evil as that, and I failed in front of all of them.
All my life I was a failure, but I didn't fail at death.
